paragraphs.text: Everyone needs legal advice at some point. Whether it's business, property, or personal matters, Mohamed Tawfik Law Firm is here to provide the legal consultation you need, with deep expertise and knowledge of Egyptian law.

Starting a Business in Egypt requires the right legal foundation. We provide comprehensive guidance from choosing the legal structure, company registration with GAFI, obtaining a tax ID, to opening corporate bank accounts.

For foreign clients, our firm offers complete service for residence procedures in Egypt: fast processing, certified translations, and smooth handling of all documentation. We make your paperwork effortless.
In real estate law, we specialize in protecting investors in Hurghada and the Red Sea. We verify ownership, draft solid contracts, and through Tawfik Property ensure both transparency and security.

cards.title: Real-Estate Tax — Who Pays?
cards.summary: By law, the seller (transferor) bears the real-estate transaction tax — clauses shifting it to the buyer are void.
points: Any agreement transferring the tax burden to the buyer is legally void.
If the buyer pays, they may recover it from the seller (unjust enrichment).
cards.legal: Court of Cassation: Appeal No. 2404 of 63 Q, Session 31/01/2001, Issue 52, p. 233.
